Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch
Description: Charles-Hubert, Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch FEATURES Stainless steel 42mm open face case with a matching curb chain White dial with date display and chronograph function Japanese quartz movement Deluxe gift box DESCRIPTION With both a date display and a chronograph function, this stunning stainless steel pocket watch will be an appealing addition to your timepiece collection. Featuring an open face design, the watch has Japanese movements and includes a gift box and a matching curb chain. Matching curb chain. Stainless steel. Open face case. White dial with date display. Chronograph function. Japanese quartz movement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 1.65 in. Dia. Equal parts classic and eclectic, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Stainless Steel Quartz Pocket Watch 3571 combines the traditional look of an old-world style with pops of vibrant color and black-tone Arabic numeral hour markers. This one-of-a-kind pocket watch has a clean white chronograph dial with three subdials and turquoise hands. A silver-tone stainless steel open-face case and matching curb chain offer retro appeal, while quartz movement provides true reliability and precision. This Charles-Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue giftbox.
